title: FS: N162 1888 Goodwin Champions Dan Brouthers PSA 7.5
author: mansco

posts.post_title: FS: N162 1888 Goodwin Champions Dan Brouthers PSA 7.5
posts.post_content: I have a N162 Dan Brouthers for sale.  Send PM if interested.
Nice grade.  I'm afraid to even ask the price.  Ok, how much?
I’m asking $9,900.  Willing to negotiate.  Would trade for something I need for similar value.

That's a great card!  I don't think I have enough to make a balanced trade, but I'm going to do some figuring...of course, I realize that just because I may have enough in value, it may not be what you need.

-Raymond
